page.title: 01CUPAR - GAZETEER
page.content: The burgh of Cupar is situated in the s/w quarter of the block. It is a market town, headquarters of N/E Fife District Council and a district service centre. It has a population of 8814, 63.4% of whom are{employed}in service industries. A variety of small_scale manufacturing industry includes mechanical engineers, printers, etc., with an expanding trading estate on the outskirts. Cupar has a{railway station}but no {bus station}_{bus services}are mainly hourly trunk services. The A91{trunk {road}passes through the centre of Cupar. The main{shopping area,}situated at the intersection of Crossgate & Bonnygate has chain stores _ Boots, Menzies, Woolworths, 2 supermarkets & specialist shops.
